about_the_game:
[ PLEASE NOTE ] For external match making, feedback, roadmap and support please join our constantly growing "Tower Tag" community on Discord ( LINK: ). You'll always find some nice people there.

Tower Tag is a hyper-dynamic futuristic paintball like PVP shooter with a grappling hook locomotion method that becomes second nature instantly. Without any motion sickness! Conquer as many tower platforms with your team as possible to be able to move quickly across the field and beat your opponents with tactics and surprise.
Tower Tag works without complicated button assignments so you can concentrate on the essentials, become one with the game and let your body be the controller.

Play casual matches with and against your friends or join the Tower Tag Community with your team to climb the rankings (coming soon) and win tournaments. To be successful training is important, but physical fitness and strategy are also essential.

Content:
● 1v1, 2v2, 3v3 and 4v4 matches
● 10 different maps
● Grappling hook locomotion
● Save Space Solution - allows free movement in small spaces
● Three different modes (Team Deathmatch, Elimination, Goal Tower)
● Custom Matches and Quick Join
● Bots for practicing and filling up teams

Near future content:
● Ranked matches
● Other maps and modes
● Detailed statistics for players and streamers
● Personalization of the avatars
● Unlockable Skins and Items
● More features for streamers
● Even better bots with auto skill level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 and better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060 / 970 GTX or or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: Graphics performance also depends on the VR headset used
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 6700K and better
  • Graphics: 980 / 1070 GTX or or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics performance also depends on the VR headset used
